text: José Masci de Abreu (8 December 1944 – 3 June 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party and later Podemos. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1995 to 2003. Abreu died at a hospital in São Paulo, Brazil on 3 June 2022 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Businesspeople from São Paulo Category:Politicians from São Paulo
title: José de Abreu (politician)
